item.title: My Badminton Story
item.description: This episode is about me sharing the first rejection in sports and how my never give up mentality gave me exposure to play badminton instead of one rejection.
item.dc:creator: Vishwas Acharya

item.title: My First Day of College
item.description:
Here is my second podcast episode. It is about my experience on the first day of College. This episode covers the routine of my first day of college and what happened on that day. It was quite a normal day for me. And if you haven't gone to college yet then go for this episode. Not so good not so bad. If you like my podcast then do subscribe and follow me.
